note:
Important to me right now: halting climate change; fighting the resurgence of fascism; winning Scottish independence.

Banner is a photo of my bicycle "AKA freedom machine" in my garden last summer. There are flowering plants and a red gate in the background.
The avatar is a photo of me wearing a plaid coat with the ocean in the background. Taken somewhere near Tongue, if memory serves, by my Austrian friend, Gudrun Kocher.
